title: Ticket #986: Better support for parallel jobs with dynamic slots
description: Currently, dynamic slots don't work well with parallel jobs, for a number of reasons. We have a user who would just like the special case of claiming all the CPUS for parallel jobs with a dynamic startd.
remarks:
Dynamic slots are now handled by ded-schedd. Jobs can be scheduled against dynamic slots, regular slots or a combination. Concurrency limits interoperate with dynamic slots. The ded schedd now publishes true job ads, instead of previous 'dummy' ad that was being published.
